  • Classes in org.neo4j.kernel.availability used by org.neo4j.kernel.availability 
    Class Description
    AvailabilityGuard
    The availability guard ensures that the database will only take calls when it is in an ok state.
    AvailabilityListener  
    AvailabilityRequirement
    Represents a description of why someone is denying access to the database, to help debugging.

    DatabaseAvailability
    This class handles whether the database as a whole is available to use at all.
